skills.name: Why Version APIs
skills.pattern: Evolve without breaking clients, backward compatibility

skills.name: Versioning Strategies
skills.pattern: URL path, query param, header, content negotiation

skills.name: Semantic Versioning
skills.pattern: MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH, breaking.feature.fix

skills.name: URL Path Versioning
skills.pattern: /api/v1/users, /api/v2/users, explicit, cacheable

skills.name: Version in Subdomain
skills.pattern: v1.api.example.com, infrastructure complexity

skills.name: Header Versioning
skills.pattern: X-API-Version: 2, cleaner URLs, less visible

skills.name: Accept Header
skills.pattern: Accept: application/vnd.api+json;version=2

skills.name: Query Parameter
skills.pattern: /api/users?version=2, simple but URL pollution

skills.name: Breaking Changes
skills.pattern: Remove field, change type, remove endpoint, rename

skills.name: Non-Breaking Changes
skills.pattern: Add optional field, add endpoint, add enum value

skills.name: Backward Compatibility
skills.pattern: Old requests still work, don't remove fields

skills.name: Forward Compatibility
skills.pattern: Ignore unknown fields, flexible parsing

skills.name: Additive Changes
skills.pattern: Add fields, add endpoints, extend enums safely

skills.name: Deprecation
skills.pattern: Sunset header, deprecation notice, migration period

skills.name: Migration Guides
skills.pattern: Document changes, code examples, breaking changes list

skills.name: Version in Response
skills.pattern: Include API version in response, X-API-Version header

skills.name: Default Version
skills.pattern: Default to latest stable, or require explicit version

skills.name: Multiple Versions
skills.pattern: Run multiple versions, shared code, adapters

skills.name: Version Routing
skills.pattern: Middleware extracts version, routes to correct controller

skills.name: Controller per Version
skills.pattern: UsersV1Controller, UsersV2Controller, clear separation

skills.name: Shared Logic
skills.pattern: Share business logic, different serialization

skills.name: GraphQL Versioning
skills.pattern: No versions, deprecate fields, additive changes

skills.name: Field Deprecation
skills.pattern: @deprecated(reason: "Use newField")

skills.name: Version Documentation
skills.pattern: Separate docs, version selector, changelog

skills.name: Changelog
skills.pattern: API changelog, breaking changes highlighted

skills.name: Version Testing
skills.pattern: Test matrix, ensure old versions work

skills.name: Contract Testing
skills.pattern: Pact, ensure no accidental breaks

skills.name: Version Lifecycle
skills.pattern: Announce EOL, sunset date, force migration

skills.name: Support Policy
skills.pattern: Support N-1 versions, 12 month deprecation

skills.name: OpenAPI Versioning
skills.pattern: Separate specs, or version in spec, tooling
